exceptions.exn: In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V l : V Hl : is_RInt f a a l Unable to unify "RInt f ?M2370 a = zero" with "l = zero".
In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V l : V Hl : is_RInt f a a l Unable to unify "RInt f ?M2369 ?M2370 = RInt (fun _ : R => zero) ?M2369 ?M2370" with "l = zero".

original: unfold RInt. apply iota_unique. intros l Hl. apply is_RInt_unique with (f:=f) (b:=a) (l:=zero). apply (RInt_ext f (fun _=> zero)). intros x Hx. rewrite Hx. reflexivity. apply Hl.
